name: can_move_to_func
description: This function is executed when a <%= type 'Character' %> attempts to move to another <%= type 'Tile' %>.
The `tile` parameter is the <%= type 'Tile' %> it is attempting to move to, and the script can query it like normal.
Return `true` if the <%= type 'Character' %> will be allowed to move to the <%= type 'Tile' %>.

parameters.name: tile
parameters.desc: The <%= type 'Tile' %> that the executing <%= type 'Character' %> is trying to move to.

return_value_desc: `true` if the executing <%= type 'Character' %> can move onto the <%= type 'Tile' %>, otherwise `false`.
